org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function
Class AeFunctionExecutionContext

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function.AeFunctionExecutionContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeFunctionExecutionContext
public class AeFunctionExecutionContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeFunctionExecutionContext

A simple implementation of a function execution context.
